item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 9, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ALICE detects the conversion of lead into gold at the LHC (182 points | 120 comments)
2. Past, Present, and Future of Sorbet Type Syntax (35 points | 4 comments)
3. Launch HN: Nao Labs (YC X25) – Cursor for Data (22 points | 10 comments)

6. Rollstack (YC W23) Is Hiring TypeScript Engineers (Remote US/CA) ( | hide)
7. Show HN: A backend agnostic Ruby framework for building reactive desktop apps (23 points | 8 comments)
8. Itter.sh – Micro-Blogging via Terminal (84 points | 29 comments)

11. Show HN: Oliphaunt – A native Mastodon client for macOS (16 points | 6 comments)

13. Former Supreme Court justice David Souter has died (28 points | 9 comments)

16. Data manipulations alleged in study that paved way for Microsoft's quantum chip (137 points | 88 comments)
17. CryptPad: An Alternative to the Google Suite (66 points | 20 comments)
18. The birth of AI poker? Letters from the 1984 WSOP (17 points | discuss)
19. The Anarchitecture Group (7 points | discuss)
20. NSF faces shake-up as officials abolish its 37 divisions (247 points | 331 comments)
21. A Taxonomy for Rendering Engines (24 points | 6 comments)
22. Implementing a Struct of Arrays (76 points | 26 comments)
23. Structuring Competency-Based Courses Through Skill Trees (30 points | 17 comments)
24. Amazon's Vulcan Robots Now Stow Items Faster Than Humans (138 points | 159 comments)
25. The CL1: the first code deployable biological computer (10 points | 7 comments)
26. The Linux Kernel's PGP Web of Trust (49 points | 8 comments)
27. Starlink User Terminal Teardown (251 points | 80 comments)
28. Dasung Paperlike 13K is a 13.3 inch E Ink color monitor (49 points | 31 comments)
29. Reconstructing illusory camouflage patterns on moth wings using computer vision (9 points | discuss)
30. Zombieverter: Open source VCU for reusing salvage EV components (62 points | 18 comments)
